house_listing.house_description: This townhouse built in 1997 has 2 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) . Rooms include master bedroom. Features include patio, fireplace, fire sprinklers.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Contemporary Style, Dining/Living Combo,Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen, Fire Sprinklers, Microwave, Pantry, TennisCourt(s)
